channel.title: [317]~ pest control ~[317]
channel.description:
Hey every one i have a PROB, My server is getting boring so i got a request for PC, And i was wondering if you could post a TuT For 80-100% PC, it dosent have to be perfect, just Fun and gives void like RS, So please Give me a TuT or link to a TuT, It would help alot Thanks!!
Source: PimpScape Type: 317 client: Yes

item.title: [317]~ pest control ~[317]
item.dc:creator: @Swift1 Swift`
item.description:
@Swift1 wrote:

Here’s some NPC spawns for it, I haven’t tested this.

    public int[] npcX = new int[100];
    public int[] npcY = new int[100];
    public int[] pestNpcId = new int[100];
    public int[] npcSlot = new int[100];
    public void NPCReload()
    {
        Server.npcHandler.newNPC(3782, 2656, 2592, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, false, -1); // VK
        Server.npcHandler.newNPC(3778, 2681, 2589, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, false, -1); // Blue
        Server.npcHandler.newNPC(3779, 2670, 2571, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, false, -1); // Yellow
        Server.npcHandler.newNPC(3780, 2646, 2570, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, false, -1); // Red
        Server.npcHandler.newNPC(3777, 2628, 2596, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, false, -1); //Purple
        pestNPC(3761, 2629, 2598); // Torcher
        pestNPC(3771, 2631, 2588); // Defiler
        pestNPC(3776, 2638, 2592); // Brawler
        pestNPC(3771, 2634, 2596); // Defiler
        pestNPC(3761, 2638, 2586); // Torcher
        pestNPC(3776, 2641, 2577); // Brawler
        pestNPC(3771, 2643, 2565); // Defiler
        pestNPC(3761, 2650, 2566); // Torcher
        pestNPC(3776, 2651, 2570); // Brawler
        pestNPC(3771, 2648, 2574); // Defiler
        pestNPC(3761, 2640, 2572); // Torcher
        pestNPC(3761, 2674, 2571); // Torcher
        pestNPC(3771, 2666, 2573); // Defiler
        pestNPC(3776, 2670, 2565); // Brawler
        pestNPC(3776, 2673, 2577); // Brawler
        pestNPC(3761, 2662, 2570); // Torcher
        pestNPC(3771, 2657, 2573); // Defiler
        pestNPC(3776, 2657, 2566); // Brawler
        pestNPC(3771, 2680, 2575); // Defiler
        pestNPC(3771, 2684, 2590); // Defiler
        pestNPC(3776, 2678, 2593); // Brawler
        pestNPC(3761, 2675, 2592); // Torcher
        pestNPC(3776, 2678, 2582); // Brawler
        pestNPC(3771, 2673, 2585); // Defiler
        pestNPC(3771, 2678, 2597); // Defiler
        pestNPC(3761, 2676, 2602); // Torcher
        pestNPC(3761, 2678, 2589); // Torcher
        pestNPC(3776, 2658, 2580); // Brawler
        pestNPC(3761, 2645, 2574); // Torcher
        pestNPC(3776, 2645, 2565); // Brawler
        pestNPC(3771, 2635, 2576); // Defiler
        pestNPC(3761, 2633, 2570); // Torcher
        pestNPC(3761, 2627, 2589); // Torcher
        pestNPC(3776, 2630, 2596); // Brawler
        pestNPC(3751, 2627, 2594); // Spinner
        pestNPC(3751, 2629, 2589); // Spinner
        pestNPC(3751, 2648, 2568); // Spinner
        pestNPC(3751, 2643, 2571); // Spinner
        pestNPC(3751, 2672, 2574); // Spinner
        pestNPC(3751, 2666, 2570); // Spinner
        pestNPC(3751, 2681, 2593); // Spinner
        pestNPC(3751, 2681, 2585); // Spinner
        pestNPC(3741, 2654, 2590); // Shifter
        pestNPC(3741, 2654, 2595); // Shifter
        pestNPC(3741, 2659, 2595); // Shifter
        pestNPC(3741, 2659, 2590); // Shifter
        pestNPC(3741, 2659, 2592); // Shifter
        pestNPC(3741, 2654, 2593); // Shifter
    }

    public void pestNPC(int id, int x, int y)
    {
        int slot = Server.npcHandler.newNPC(id, x, y, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, false, -1);
        appendPestNPC(id, slot, x, y);
        pestGfx(188, 0, slot, 0);
    }
    public void pestGfx(int Id, int Delay, int i, int Height)
    {
        if (i > 0)
        {
            NPC npc = Server.npcHandler.npcs[i];
            if (npc != null)
            {
                if (Id >= 0)
                {
                    npc.GfxId = Id;
                    npc.GfxDelay = Delay;
                    npc.GfxHeight = Height;
                    npc.updateRequired = true;
                    npc.GraphicsUpdateRequired = true;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    public void appendPestNPC(int id, int slot, int x, int y)
    {
        for (int i = 0; i < idNPC.length; i++)
        {
            if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[slotNPC[i]] == null)
            {
                npcX[i] = x;
                npcY[i] = y;
                pestNpcId[i] = id;
                npcSlot[i] = slot;
                break;
            }
        }
    }

You may need to adjust some of the code to match your server. If you can’t figure out where this goes, you don’t deserve it.
